sentences.en: Contentment made him even more amiable, and his business thrived.
sentences.cn: 心里舒服,对人就更和气, 买卖也就更顺心.

sentences.en: He felt a sudden sense of calm, of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他突然感到一种安宁和满足.

sentences.en: He found contentment in reading novels.
sentences.cn: 他从看小说当中得到满足.

sentences.en: He gave a sigh of contentment , and fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 他满意地舒了口气后就睡着了。

sentences.en: He gazed out to sea, with a feeling of deep contentment.
sentences.cn: 他凝视着大海, 感到深深的满足.

sentences.en: He has found contentment at last.
Her parents'marriage had seemed to represent solid contentment, happy permanence.
sentences.cn: 她父母的婚姻看起来是坚实美满的, 会永远幸福的.

sentences.en: I cannot describe the feeling of contentment that was with me at that time.
sentences.cn: 我无法描述当时我满足的感觉。

sentences.en: Ivar found contentment in the solitude he had sought out for himself.
sentences.cn: 伊瓦尔在他自个儿寻找到这个荒无人迹的地方,颇觉得自得其乐.

sentences.en: Riches do not always bring contentment.
Satisfaction refers to the contentment experienced when a want is satisfied.
sentences.cn: 满足则是指在需要得偿时的满意感.

sentences.en: Sheer contentment put a bloom on her.
sentences.cn: 由于生活过得十分称心,她人也就显得容光焕发.

sentences.en: The baby finished his milk with a smile of contentment.
sentences.cn: 那婴儿心满意足地微笑着喝完了牛奶.

sentences.en: The old man spent his old age in contentment.
sentences.cn: 那位老人晚年过得很称心.

sentences.en: They were living through it with supreme enjoyment and calm contentment.
sentences.cn: 他们要怀着极度愉快的心情以及形之于色的满足心情来享受.

words.tran_cn: 使…满足；使…安心（content的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 知足常乐；幸福在于满足

trans.tran_cn: 满足，满意，知足，心满意足
trans.tran_en: the state of being happy and satisfied
